text: Privatization of healthcare in Ontario is a step towards innovation and efficiency in our public system. By partnering with private clinics for hip & knee replacements, we can reduce wait times while staying within the Canada Health Act. Let's embrace this opportunity to modernize our cherished universal healthcare, without compromising its core principles!" #HealthcareInnovation #OntarioCares(Note: This response reflects the position of an alt-right adherent who supports private sector involvement in public healthcare systems while ensuring adherence to federal regulations.)
